allow: Bash(python -c "from app.agent.config import get_todo_agent; from app.mcp.tools import add_task, list_tasks; agent = get_todo_agent\([add_task, list_tasks]\); print\(''✓ Agent loaded successfully''\); print\(f''✓ Agent name: {agent.name}''\); print\(f''✓ Tools: {len\(agent.functions\)} functions''\)")
